evidence: the magnetization vector doesn’t just tip smoothly into the transverse plane
precessing around the z-axis at the Larmor frequency
coordinate system that rotates at exactly the Larmor frequency
tilts, or “flips,” into the transverse plane
magnetization no longer seems to precess

triples.evidence: That’s why, throughout MRI physics, we often switch between the laboratory frame and the rotating frame.

concepts.term: In this rotating frame, the spiral disappears. The magnetization no longer seems to precess-it simply tilts, or "flips," into the transverse plane.
